name: Square Word: Back to Work
description:
Holidays are over but the fun is not!

Grab your stuff and let's enjoy a new SQUARE WORD episode!


Don't work too hard and remember to relax from time to time with a nice word game!
MALI, the little tiger, can't wait to play with you in this new edition!

  • Four very cool themes: Sports - Jobs - Places - Autumn
  • 140+ words to find
  • Handcrafted grids
  • Daily challenge
  • 4 difficulties (easy to very hard)
  • Difficulty increasing gradually.
  • Letter & word hints.
  • Collect Stamps with extra objectives and receive rewards!
  • New Feature: Draw a line when you connect letters!
  • Additional songs.
Are you ready?

All Square Word games:
